item.title: Mindmaps
item.description: ABSTRACT Mind maps have a very long history that goes as far back as the 3d century. They have been proven to be very effective tool not only for studying but also for innovation and creativity. Thus, the main goal of this research was to find out how many students of the University of Latvia use mind maps and afterwards compere the use of mind map frequency between full-time and part-time students, especially in home reading assignments.

item.title: Authentic Materials for ESP
item.description: The question whether to use or not to use authentic materials in English for specific purpose course is more topical than ever. More and more people are studying new languages every day and as English is the international language, researchers are especially interested to find out the advantages and disadvantages of using authentic materials in English teaching classes. As nowadays knowing a foreign language can be very beneficial not only in the job market, but also in real life situations, many people are trying to find ways how to study a language in a more efficient and exciting way.
